general_info.summary: Noida International University (NIU), sponsored by Maruti Educational Trust and established by U.P. LEGISLATURE ACT NO. 27 OF 2010, is a 75-acre university located in Greater Noida. It offers diverse programs across 12 schools, attracting students from over 60 countries. NIU has been recognized with an 'A+' grade (3.44/4) in its first NAAC accreditation cycle, outperforming other private state universities. The university also includes the Noida International Institute of Medical Sciences (NIIMS), a 750+ bedded hospital and medical college focused on a pragmatic approach to medical education. NIU operates under participatory governance principles, with its vision, mission, and strategic plan guiding its institutional priorities.
general_info.raw_content:
Noida International University, established under U.P. LEGISLATURE ACT NO. 27 OF 2010 and recognized by Section 2(f) of the UGC Act, 1956, is proudly sponsored by the Maruti Educational Trust. Its expansive 75-acre campus, adorned with lush greenery and distinctive architectural designs, distinguishes it as a premier educational institution. Strategically positioned within the educational hub near the Yamuna Expressway in Gautam Budh Nagar, Greater Noida.NIU achieved recognition for its academic prowess by receiving the highest score of 3.44 out of 4 with Grade A+ in the first cycle of NAAC accreditation, outperforming all other private state universities in India. This honor was bestowed by the prestigious autonomous institution under the UGC, Ministry of Education, Government of India.NIU offers a diverse range of programs across 12 schools. These programs span Engineering, Management, Law, Medical, and Social Sciences, catering to the academic interests of students from over 60+ nations who place their trust in the university’s curriculum.Additionally, NIU houses a 750+ bedded Hospital and a Medical College named Noida International Institute of Medical Sciences (NIIMS), which is recognized as a Centre of Excellence. NIIMS is dedicated to developing a unique pedagogy for medical education, with a greater focus on a pragmatic approach that allows students to explore the deeper nuances of medical education.
Noida International University is committed to participatory governance principles, designed to guide decision-making and support the institution’s vision and mission. Our governance ideals are expressed in our vision, mission, and objectives, quality policies, and core values. NIU’s strategic plan reflects the University’s objectives and encompasses our vision, institutional priorities, and the strategic actions required to succeed.

core_values.summary: Northern Illinois University (NIU) defines its core values as code of conduct, integrity, quality, innovation, specialization, respect, and results, which guide the actions and behavior of the university and its employees. These values are further exemplified through commitments to national development, fostering healthy competition, academic excellence, secularism, character building, leadership development, nurturing talent, and contributing to innovative research.
core_values.raw_content:
Core values of the university are understood as majorly code of conduct, integrity, quality, innovation, specialization, respect, and results. Our core values serve to guide our actions and describe how we behave in the world. NIU and its employees commit to the stated core values.
• Progression towards national development
• Fostering healthy competition among students
• Commitment to academic excellence
• Inculcating a value system and secular outlook
• Building strong character and competence
• Creating effective leadership
• Nurturing talents and young minds
• Contributing towards innovative research
